page.title: 09A Family Sunday
page.content: My family is my mum, Pauline, my dad David, my younger brother Guy and myself, Joanne.I get up at 8.30, get dressed, washed and have breakfast of cereals. After Guy has had breakfast and our animals have been fed, we both watch television. My friends call for me to take our dogs for a walk. Guy goes to his friend Antonys across the valley. Mum and dad are usually up now but if dads been working all night he stays in bed. Mum does house work while I play out. This is more or less what we do all day except I come home for dinner and Guy stays at Antonys. For Sunday tea we usually have a pudding of custard. In the evening both guy and I shampoo our hair. We clean our teeth and go to bed about 9pm we dont have supper because we've had a big meal.
